div.ab:
عرپف الحكار سعر ارپعه وعسرپن وپصف
مفرح محمّد واسمعل وإسمعيل
إردب ونصف أربعة ويبات
وأم جفاني أم اسمعل إسمعيل
أحد عشر ويبة ويبة
القيمة
مايتي مايتين وثمانية دراهم
داله العرپف دللة حوالة إحالة صفا سعر پلپه وثلاثپن الاردپ
ساس عپد الرحيم الوالى
ــه وپپاپ ويبپپن اردب
خلف مرزوق نجيب
أحد عشر ويبة إردب ستّة أردابارادب
ونصف
الڤپمــه
ماية وأحد وخمسين درهم
عرپف الحــكار وعلايڤه
ســتّمائة تسعة وخمسين درهما

ʿarīfu ăl ḥukkāri siʿr:un ʾarbaʿaẗ:un wa ʿišrīna wa niṣf:un
mufriḥ:un muḥammad:un wa ʾismāʿīlu
ʾirdabb:un wa niṣf:un ʾarbaʿaẗu waybāt:in
wa ʾummu ǧafānī ʾummu ʾismāʿīla
ʾaḥada ʿašara waybaẗ:an waybaẗ:un
ăl qīmaẗu
miyatay miyatayni wa ṯamāniyaẗu darāhima
dāllaẗu dilālaẗu ḥawālaẗu ʾiḥālaẗu ăl ʿarīfi ṣafā siʿr:un ṯalāṯaẗu wa ṯalāṯīna ăl ʾirdabba
***sās ʿabdu ăr raḥīmi ăl wālī
***ẗu waybāt:in waybatayni ʾirdabb:un
ḫalaf:un marzūq:un naǧību
ʾaḥada ʿašara waybaẗ:an ʾirdabb:un sittaẗu ʾarādiba
wa niṣf:un
ăl qīmaẗu
*** miyaẗ:in wa ʾaḥad:un wa ḫamsīna dirham
ʿarīfu ăl ḥukkāri wa ʿalāyyiqu hu
sittu miʾaẗ:in tisʿaẗ:un wa ḫamsīna dirham:an

[Owed to? paid to?] the head of the hoarders [are] the costs of twenty-four and a half [waybas of wheat]: [Owed to? paid to?] the head of the hoarders (? ʿarīf al-ḥukkār) [are] the costs of twenty-four and a half [waybas of wheat]:
Mufriḥ: | Muḥammad and Ismāʿīl: Mufriḥ (Mufarrij?): | Muḥammad and Ismāʿīl:
one and a half irdabbs; | four waybas;
And Umm Jafānī (?): | Umm Ismāʿīl:
eleven waybas; | one wayba.
The total costs:
Two hundred and eighty dirhams.
Brokerage comission (? dālla) [owed to? paid to?] the head [of the hoarders] is cleaned (ṣafā); [and] the costs of thiry-three irdabbs [of wheat] are: Brokerage comission [owed to? paid to?] the head [of the hoarders] is cleared; [and] the costs of thiry-three irdabbs [of wheat] are:
[...]sās: | ʿAbd al-Raḥīm: | The mayor: [...]sās: | ʿAbd al-Raḥīm: | The mayor (al-wālī):
[three?] waybas; | two waybas; | one irdabb;
Khalaf: | Marzūq: | Najīb:
eleven waybas; | one irdabb; | six irdabbs
| | and a half.
The total costs:
[Eight?] hundred and fifty-one dirhams.
[Owed to, or paid to, the head of?] the hoarders and his associates: [Owed to, or paid to, the head of?] the hoarders and his associates (ʿalāʾiqih):
Six hundred and fifty-nine dirhams.
